name: Shadow Crash
description:
Introduction

You stranded on an unknown planet. It doesn't take too long to understand that at night shadows come out and will try to take your life. 

You embrace your weapon and prepare to delay the inevitable as sunset comes close.

Keyboard

- WASD to move and jump

- E to shoot

How to play

Your spaceship is broken and can't fly anymore. You want to survive but you're just delaying the inevitable as sunset approaches. But you noticed a weird cage-like machine nearby and... well... this planet is littered with CATS!

You might want to try and get the cats in the machine to see if you can grab their infamous seven lives.

And when it turns dark, well... that's when shadows start creeping around. Try to nuke them out as fast as possible and see how long you can survive.

Ludum Dare alert

Please notice that this is my entry for the Ludum Dare 50 compo category. Everything has been hand-crafted by me, code, art, music.

This game is going to be full of bugs and it is missing a lot of the mechanics I originally had in mind but, you know, 48 hours isn't much time :)
